verses.verse: וַיָּבֹ֤א <WH935> came הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <WH4428> So the king וְהָמָ֔ן <WH2001> and Haman לִשְׁתּ֖וֹת <WH8354> to banquet עִם־ <WH5973> with אֶסְתֵּ֥ר <WH635> with Esther הַמַּלְכָּֽה׃ <WH4436> the queen

וַיֹּאמֶר֩ <WH559> said הַמֶּ֨לֶךְ <WH4428> And the king לְאֶסְתֵּ֜ר <WH635> again unto Esther גַּ֣ם <WH1571> also בַּיּ֤וֹם <WH3117> day הַשֵּׁנִי֙ <WH8145> on the second בְּמִשְׁתֵּ֣ה <WH4960> at the banquet הַיַּ֔יִן <WH3196> of wine מַה־ <WH4100> What שְּׁאֵלָתֵ֛ךְ <WH7596> What [is] thy petition אֶסְתֵּ֥ר <WH635> to Esther הַמַּלְכָּ֖ה <WH4436> queen וְתִנָּ֣תֵֽן <WH5414> add לָ֑ךְ וּמַה־ <WH4100> and what בַּקָּשָׁתֵ֛ךְ <WH1246> request עַד־ <WH5704> against חֲצִ֥י <WH2677> [even] to the half הַמַּלְכ֖וּת <WH4438> of the kingdom וְתֵעָֽשׂ׃ <WH6213> shall be done

וַתַּ֨עַן <WH6030> answered אֶסְתֵּ֤ר <WH635> Then Esther הַמַּלְכָּה֙ <WH4436> the queen וַתֹּאמַ֔ר <WH559> and said אִם־ <WH518> If מָצָ֨אתִי <WH4672> If I have found חֵ֤ן <WH2580> favour בְּעֵינֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH5869> in thy sight הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <WH4428> O king וְאִם־ <WH518> and if עַל־ <WH5921> and הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> the king ט֑וֹב <WH2895> and if it please תִּנָּֽתֶן־ <WH5414> be given לִ֤י נַפְשִׁי֙ <WH5315> let my life בִּשְׁאֵ֣לָתִ֔י <WH7596> me at my petition וְעַמִּ֖י <WH5971> and my people בְּבַקָּשָׁתִֽי׃ <WH1246> at my request

כִּ֤י <WH3588> for נִמְכַּ֙רְנוּ֙ <WH4376> For we are sold אֲנִ֣י <WH589> and וְעַמִּ֔י <WH5971> I and my people לְהַשְׁמִ֖יד <WH8045> to be destroyed לַהֲר֣וֹג <WH2026> to be slain וּלְאַבֵּ֑ד <WH6> and to perish וְ֠אִלּוּ <WH432> But if לַעֲבָדִ֨ים <WH5650> for bondmen וְלִשְׁפָח֤וֹת <WH8198> and bondwomen נִמְכַּ֙רְנוּ֙ <WH4376> we had been sold הֶחֱרַ֔שְׁתִּי <WH2790> I had held my tongue כִּ֣י <WH3588> for אֵ֥ין <WH369> for הַצָּ֛ר <WH6862> although the enemy שֹׁוֶ֖ה <WH7737> could not countervail בְּנֵ֥זֶק <WH5143> damage הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <WH4428> the king's ס

וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> answered הַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> Then the king אֲחַשְׁוֵר֔וֹשׁ <WH325> Ahasuerus וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <WH559> and said לְאֶסְתֵּ֣ר <WH635> unto Esther הַמַּלְכָּ֑ה <WH4436> the queen מִ֣י <WH4310> Who ה֥וּא <WH1931> he זֶה֙ <WH2088> is he וְאֵֽי־ <WH335> and where זֶ֣ה <WH2088> he ה֔וּא <WH1931> is he אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who מְלָא֥וֹ <WH4390> Who is he and where is he that durst presume לִבּ֖וֹ <WH3820> in his heart לַעֲשׂ֥וֹת <WH6213> to do כֵּֽן׃ <WH3651> after that

וַתֹּ֣אמֶר־ <WH559> said אֶסְתֵּ֔ר <WH635> And Esther אִ֚ישׁ <WH376> a צַ֣ר <WH6862> foe וְאוֹיֵ֔ב <WH341> and enemy הָמָ֥ן <WH2001> Haman הָרָ֖ע <WH7451> [is] this wicked הַזֶּ֑ה <WH2088> is this וְהָמָ֣ן <WH2001> Then Haman נִבְעַ֔ת <WH1204> was afraid מִלִּפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> before הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> the king וְהַמַּלְכָּֽה׃ <WH4436> and the queen

וְהַמֶּ֜לֶךְ <WH4428> And the king קָ֤ם <WH6965> arising בַּחֲמָתוֹ֙ <WH2534> in his wrath מִמִּשְׁתֵּ֣ה <WH4960> from the banquet הַיַּ֔יִן <WH3196> of wine אֶל־ <WH413> against גִּנַּ֖ת <WH1594> garden הַבִּיתָ֑ן <WH1055> [went] into the palace וְהָמָ֣ן <WH2001> and Haman עָמַ֗ד <WH5975> stood up לְבַקֵּ֤שׁ <WH1245> to make request עַל־ <WH5921> for נַפְשׁוֹ֙ <WH5315> for his life מֵֽאֶסְתֵּ֣ר <WH635> to Esther הַמַּלְכָּ֔ה <WH4436> the queen כִּ֣י <WH3588> for רָאָ֔ה <WH7200> for he saw כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for כָלְתָ֥ה <WH3615> determined אֵלָ֛יו <WH413> against הָרָעָ֖ה <WH7451> that there was evil מֵאֵ֥ת <WH854> by הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <WH4428> against him by the king

וְהַמֶּ֡לֶךְ <WH4428> Then the king שָׁב֩ <WH7725> returned מִגִּנַּ֨ת <WH1594> garden הַבִּיתָ֜ן <WH1055> out of the palace אֶל־ <WH413> into בֵּ֣ית ׀ <WH1004> into the place מִשְׁתֵּ֣ה <WH4960> of the banquet הַיַּ֗יִן <WH3196> of wine וְהָמָן֙ <WH2001> and Haman נֹפֵ֔ל <WH5307> was fallen עַל־ <WH5921> on הַמִּטָּה֙ <WH4296> upon the bed אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> after אֶסְתֵּ֣ר <WH635> whereon Esther עָלֶ֔יהָ <WH5921> and וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> [was] Then said הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <WH4428> the king הֲ֠גַם <WH1571> even לִכְבּ֧וֹשׁ <WH3533> Will he force אֶת־ <WH853> הַמַּלְכָּ֛ה <WH4436> the queen עִמִּ֖י <WH5973> into בַּבָּ֑יִת <WH1004> the place הַדָּבָ֗ר <WH1697> act יָצָא֙ <WH3318> went out מִפִּ֣י <WH6310> mouth הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <WH4428> of the king's וּפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> face הָמָ֖ן <WH2001> Haman's חָפֽוּ׃ <WH2645> they covered ס

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> said חַ֠רְבוֹנָה <WH2726> And Harbonah אֶחָ֨ד <WH259> one מִן־ <WH4480> at הַסָּרִיסִ֜ים <WH5631> of the chamberlains לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> before הַמֶּ֗לֶךְ <WH4428> the king גַּ֣ם <WH1571> indeed הִנֵּה־ <WH2009> Behold הָעֵ֣ץ <WH6086> Behold also the gallows אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which עָשָׂ֪ה <WH6213> had made הָמָ֟ן <WH2001> which Haman לְֽמָרְדֳּכַ֞י <WH4782> for Mordecai אֲשֶׁ֧ר <WH834> who דִּבֶּר־ <WH1696> who had spoken ט֣וֹב <WH2896> good עַל־ <WH5921> behalf הַמֶּ֗לֶךְ <WH4428> for the king עֹמֵד֙ <WH5975> standeth בְּבֵ֣ית <WH1004> in the house הָמָ֔ן <WH2001> of Haman גָּבֹ֖הַּ <WH1364> high חֲמִשִּׁ֣ים <WH2572> fifty אַמָּ֑ה <WH520> cubits וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> said הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> Then the king תְּלֻ֥הוּ <WH8518> Hang עָלָֽיו׃ <WH5921> behalf

וַיִּתְלוּ֙ <WH8518> So they hanged אֶת־ <WH853> הָמָ֔ן <WH2001> Haman עַל־ <WH5921> on הָעֵ֖ץ <WH6086> on the gallows אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which הֵכִ֣ין <WH3559> that he had prepared לְמָרְדֳּכָ֑י <WH4782> for Mordecai וַחֲמַ֥ת <WH2534> wrath הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> Then was the king's שָׁכָֽכָה׃ <WH7918> pacified פ
